item.description:
We are in the mood for good times and great Cuban (Spanish) fare, so we are checking out Azucar Restaurant this time.

The restaurant is well known for its delightful staff and superb cuisine. The menu at Azucar Restaurant features a wide array of great selections, made from only the freshest and highest quality ingredients, with something sure to please every member of our group.

 Azucar Restaurant has established itself as one of the area's favorite culinary destinations and offers a pleasant and unique dining experience. So come on out and join us...just close your eyes and let the aromas conjour up visions of Cuba...maybe a small cafe in downtown Havana. Then let the tastes of this tropical paradise sweep you away in a fusion of different cuisines from Spain, Africa and the Caribbean which, all combine to make this experience a treat for the senses!
item.why: We all need a bit of spice in our lives once in awhile...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Welcome To Cuba @ Azucar in Hartford!
